clients.query: select count(*) from {schema}.addresses where person_id in (select id from {schema}.persons where type='actor_client');
select count(*) from {schema}.phonenumbers where person_id in (select id from {schema}.persons where type='actor_client');

deputies.query: select count(*) from {schema}.addresses where person_id in (select id from {schema}.persons where type='actor_deputy');
select count(*) from {schema}.phonenumbers where person_id in (select id from {schema}.persons where type='actor_deputy');

death.query: select count(*) from {schema}.death_notifications where person_id in (select id from {schema}.persons where type='actor_client');
select count(*) from {schema}.death_notifications where person_id in (select id from {schema}.persons where type='actor_deputy');

warnings.query: select count(*) from {schema}.person_warning where person_id in (select id from {schema}.persons where type='actor_client');
select count(*) from {schema}.person_warning where person_id in (select id from {schema}.persons where type='actor_deputy');
